item.title: EtherSphere Spans The World With Ethernet
item.description:
Global Crossing, through its EtherSphere solutions, provides standardized Carrier Ethernet services globally, offering a centralized network solution for multinational companies with dispersed operations. EtherSphere offers various standardized Ethernet services defined by the Metro Ethernet Forum (MEF). These services include Point-to-Point Ethernet Private Line (EPL) or E-Line, multipoint connections like Ethernet Virtual Private Line (EVPL), Point-to-Multipoint or E-Tree, and Multipoint-to-Multipoint Ethernet Private LAN or VPLS (Virtual Private LAN Service) E-LAN. This range of Ethernet services caters to diverse connectivity needs for interconnecting multiple locations...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ethersphere-spans-the-world-with-ethernet/
